alert.note: Alert for Hardin (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 17 at 12:04PM CDT until June 17 at 12:45PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: The National Weather Service in Memphis has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Tishomingo County in northeastern Mississippi... Southwestern Hardin County in west Tennessee... * Until 1245 PM CDT. * At 1204 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Savannah, moving south at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Savannah, J P Coleman State Park, Pickwick Landing State Park, Pickwick Dam, Pineflat, Shiloh, Counce, Damon, Doskie, Southside, Hamburg, Pollards Mill, Bruton Branch, Pittsburg Landing, Childers Hill, Maddox, Hurley, Walkertown, Winn Springs and Red Sulphur Springs. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
